item.description:
Dress warmly it was very cold the first time we went skating.  Bring layers of clothing. Also the directions are screwy since 229 Brook Street entrance was closed last time and probably will be again. Use 137 Monument St as the address.  It's the Haverhill Public High School.  Then follow the signs to the Ice Rink. I'll see you all on Sunday.  I'll send a separate email to all the people who have RSVP'd with my phone number so you can call me if you can't find us.

If people are interested we can go out for coffee or hot chocolate after!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside the first doors (not the actual ice rink area) with a sign that says "OLT Group"

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Ice skating
